author: gstein
msg: Some various cleanup and small nits on the path towards Target and
Dependency integration.
* build/generator/gen_base.py:
(GeneratorBase.__init__): remove call to .find_sources(), and pass
the sources to the .add_dependencies() method.
(Target.find_sources): removed. became TargetLinked._get_sources().
(Target.add_dependencies): takes a source patterns argument, and no
longer implements any behavior (subclasses must implement).
(TargetLinked.add_dependencies): contains code from the old
Target.add_dependencies() method. it now uses ._get_sources() to
fetch the sources rather than find_sources() and ._sources.
(TargetLinked._get_sources): bulk of the code came from
Target.find_sources(), but we now return the sources rather than
stash it into an instance variable.
(TargetScript.find_sources): removed
(TargetScript.add_dependencies): added 'src_patterns' parameter
(TargetSWIG.__init__): make objext and libext "private"
(TargetSWIG.add_dependencies): added 'src_patterns' parameter. use
the src_patterns to find the source(s) rather than relying on
self._sources. compensate for privatization of objext/libext.
(class TargetSpecial): new class for the three special build targets
(class TargetProject, class TargetExternal, class TargetUtility):
switch to subclass from TargetSpecial rather than TargetLinked.
remove overrides of find_sources and add_dependencies.

author: sussman
msg: RFC 2518 nitpicking.  A resource's DAV:getcontenttype property should
reflect whatever Content-type: would be returned when doing a GET.
(This is, however, orthogonal to the DAV:resourcekind property.)
* mod_dav_svn/liveprops.c (dav_svn_insert_prop):  return the 'default'
DAV:getcontenttype property correctly, for those times when
svn:mime-type isn't defined.  For files, the default type is
text/plain.  For directories, the default type is either text/html
or text/xml.

author: philip
msg: Some of the merge behaviour is controversial, so at the very
least we ought to have a regression test for it.
* subversion/tests/libsvn_delta/diff-diff3-test.c
(merge_with_part_already_present): Tweak indentation.
(merge_adjacent_changes): New test.

author: rooneg
msg: * subversion/clients/cmdline/main.c
(main): add the other commands which can result in a commit to the
code that verifies any log message we received on the command line
makes sense before proceeding.

author: gstein
msg: Removed some (locally) unnecessary headers from log.h and wc.h. This
required some fixes to some .c files which inadvertently depended upon
the headers including functionality the .c files required.
* libsvn_wc/wc.h: remove svn_string.h, svn_path.h, and svn_xml.h
* libsvn_wc/log.h: remove svn_string.h, svn_path.h, and svn_xml.h
* libsvn_wc/merge.c, libsvn_wc/diff.c, libsvn_wc/entries.c,
libsvn_wc/adm_crawler.c, libsvn_wc/log.c, libsvn_wc/adm_ops.c,
libsvn_wc/lock.c: add needed headers. some reordering.
